thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Carol M
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Carol M

author: Carol M
title: Carol M
text: Although I only placed my order yesterday and have yet to receive my merchandise, I must say the website for Ruby Lane is excellent. I especially like the customer service with regards to online credit card payment. One extra step to make the payment, but well worth the security effort. Thank you. Will definitely shop here again.
